title: Emprez BI Module - Reports: Work, Late Arrivals, Absences and Amounts paid per Employee
content: This report will give you an overview of the following data for an employee over a period of 90 days maximum:TimesheetLate arrivalsAbsenteeism: Number of authorized abs., non-authorized abs., absenteeism rateAmounts Paid, compensation by type of premiumsEach data is accompanied by the average of the company, you can also choose to display the Emprez index for a comparison to other companies of the same type as yours.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
